Hi there, I'm Mazen; I have graduated from Oregon State Univesity with a BS degree in Computer Science Applied in Artificial Intelligence; with a minor in Actuarial Science. I have worked at the Center for Genome Research & Bio-computing as a Lead GPU Computational Researcher. I am the President of OSU AI Club. I work on projects on GitHub and participate in Kaggle competitions to distract me from school. I am available for work. You could contact me.
